home.title: AWS Cloud Solutions Journey
home.des: This website lists all courses created by teams at Amazon Web Services (AWS). Each course provides theory lessons with interactive quiz to test your knowledge as you complete each module. You can see the course assigned to you by signing in.

highlight.title: 100 courses and growing
highlight.desc: New courses and content added and updated all the time.

highlight.title: Interactive quiz
highlight.desc: Test your knowledge with interactive quiz after theory lessons.

highlight.title: Certification of completion
highlight.desc: Receive a certification once complete a course.
